thread.title: White House confident travel ban will be reinstated
thread.title_full: White House confident travel ban will be reinstated

title: White House confident travel ban will be reinstated
text:
6 February 2017 at 10:26pm White House confident travel ban will be reinstated Play video Video report by ITV News Washington Correspondent R obert Moore 
The White House has expressed confidence that President Donald Trump's travel ban, affecting people from seven mainly Muslim countries, will be reinstated by a higher court. 
Trump's Press Secretary Sean Spicer insisted the President "utilised his power in a legal and constitutional manner", and said the restraining order against the ban was issued by a judge in Seattle who had "gone rogue". 
Meanwhile President Trump continued to cause controversy when he claimed Europe was being attacked by terrorists on a regular basis but the incidents are not being reported by the media. Last updated Mon 6 Feb 2017
